name: CreateOneTimePayment
description:
Initiates a one-time payment process for a specified worker.

This tool is used to create a one-time payment for a worker by specifying necessary information such as reason, position, and payment details. It's part of the Request One-Time Payment business process in Core Compensation, secured by the REST service.

parameters.name: worker_id
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the worker for whom the one-time payment is being initiated.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: payment_request_details
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing payment info, including reason, position, and payment amount. Required fields: reason{id}, position{id}, oneTimePayments{paymentCurrency{id}, oneTimePaymentPlan{id}}.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
